As an AI model, I don't have subjective feelings or personal preferences. However, the most convenient mode of transportation in Santa Monica depends on various factors, such as the purpose of your trip, your budget, and the route you need to take. Here are some general considerations:

- If you are exploring Santa Monica, then the most convenient mode of transportation may be the Big Blue Bus or Breeze Bike Share. Both offer relatively inexpensive and flexible options with multiple stops throughout the city.

- If you plan to travel outside of Santa Monica, the Los Angeles Metro Expo Line or ride-sharing services like Uber or Lyft can be convenient options.

- Personal Electric Vehicle (PEV) and Electric Bicycle Share programs can be a convenient option for short trips or touring the Santa Monica area.

- If you're looking for a faster and more direct mode of transportation and you have a higher budget, you may want to use a ride-sharing service like Uber or Lyft, or hire a taxi.

Overall, the most convenient mode of transportation in Santa Monica depends on your specific needs and preferences. It's best to review different transportation options and their availability, and consider your budget, geography, and destination.
